ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8201_2002_01_1:
Hi there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Something
tells me today’s going to be awesome.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8201_2003_01_1:
I feel great on days I get to see you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8201_2101_01_1:
Oh, perfect timing. Here! This is for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8201_2101_02_1:
I just happened to find that earlier. I hope you
find it useful.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8201_2102_02_1: I figured it would help you shine even brighter.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8201_2103_01_1: I’ve been holding on to this. It’s just for you.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8201_2103_02_1:
Consider it a token of my appreciation for
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8201_2103_03_1:
If it can help you shine on stage, it would make
me happy, too!
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8201_2202_01_1: I’d love to hear your stories.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8201_2203_01_1:
What kind of stories do you have for me to enjoy
today, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8201_2302_01_1: Oh, a present for me? Thanks!
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8201_2301_01_1: What a lovely present. I’ll cherish it.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8201_2301_02_1:
Thanks! This makes me so happy. I’ll have to get
you something, too... Wait for it, OK?
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8201_2402_01_1: Thanks. I had a great time.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8201_2401_01_1:
I lose track of time when I’m talking with
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8201_2401_02_1:
I’m looking forward to spending time with
you again!
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8001_0701_01_1:
This place is so comforting. It’s one of my
favorite spots.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8001_0701_02_1:
By spending a chill time here, I can jump right
back into the spotlight when I need to!
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8002_0701_01_1:
People can have different sides. The way they’re
viewed can also differ from person to person.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8002_0701_02_1: For me, you’re a comforting presence...
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8002_0701_03_1:
And there might be a side of me that only you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], know about.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8003_0701_01_1:
When I’m with you, I feel like I can be my true
self. I wonder why.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8003_0701_02_1:
But the person I am when I shine on stage is also
undeniably me.
ch0106_00_kamitsure_salon/8003_0701_03_1:
I hope my fans come to like both sides
of who I am.
